name: Space Traders
description:
Space Traders is based on SpaceTraders Api 

This is a multiplayer galactic sandbox

  • Trade resources between planets
  • Buy ships
  • Build facilities
  • Expand your trading empire

We manage to implement each Api features, and add some new mechanics like route automation or map :)

This work is made on my freetime, Thx you for your support! 

Have fun!

TIPS :

  • You need to take the starter loan to unlock some credits.
  • But don't forget to repay your loan !
  • Some simple ships with 100 cargo capacity is great for the beginning.
  • Market is only accessible when a ship is on a planet, so one or two scout ship may be useful.
